abstract: Shawn Jenkins, former New York City police officer, pleads guilty to attempted burglary and conspiracy for planning to break into Inwood apartment he thought hid drug dealer's cash.
snippet: A police officer plotted to burglarize an Inwood apartment, and jolt the resident with a stun gun, so he could open floorboards that he thought hid a drug dealer’s cash.
lead_paragraph: A police officer plotted to burglarize an Inwood apartment, and jolt the resident with a stun gun, so he could open floorboards that he thought hid a drug dealer’s cash.

headline.main: Officer Guilty in a Strange Hunt for Treasure
headline.print_headline: Officer Guilty in a Strange Hunt for Treasure
headline.seo: N.Y.P.D. Officer Guilty in Hunt for Apartment’s Treasure
